question: I'm looking back at our previous conversation where you created two sad songs for me. Can you remind me what was the chord progression for the chorus in the second song?
answer: C D E F G A B A G F E D C

haystack_sessions.content: Create a sad song with notes

Here's a sad song with notes for you:

Verse 1:
C D E E E D C C
The rain falls down on me
C D E E E D C C
As I stand alone, can't you see?
C D E F E D C C
The tears mix with the rain
C D E F E D C C
And I feel this pain, again and again

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Verse 2:
C D E E E D C C
The memories flood my mind
C D E E E D C C
Of the laughter we left behind
C D E F E D C C
But now it's just emptiness
C D E F E D C C
I can't find my way, in this darkness

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Bridge:
G G A A B B A G
I wish I could turn back time
G G A A B B A G
To when you were still mine
G G A A B B A G
But now I'm left with this pain
G G A A B B A G
And the memories that remain

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Outro:
C D E E E D C C
The rain keeps falling down
C D E E E D C C
And I'm left to drown
C D E F E D C C
In this sea of tears and pain
C D E F E D C C
And I'll never be the same.

Sure, here's a more romantic and heart-felt song for you:

Verse 1:
G A B C D E D C B A G
When I first saw you, my heart skipped a beat
G A B C D E D C B A G
I knew right then, you were someone I'd need
G A B C D E D C B A G
You smiled at me, and my heart took flight
G A B C D E D C B A G
I knew in that moment, you were my light

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Verse 2:
G A B C D E D C B A G
You bring color to my world, where there was none
G A B C D E D C B A G
You make me feel alive, like the rising sun
G A B C D E D C B A G
Your touch ignites a flame, that never fades
G A B C D E D C B A G
With you beside me, I'm unafraid

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Bridge:
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
I promise to love you, for all time
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Together we'll weather any climb
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Our love will be the light, that guides the way
G A B C D E F E D C B A G
Together forever, come what may

Chorus:
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
You're the one I want, the one I need
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
In your eyes, I see my destiny
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
With you by my side, I can face anything
C D E F G A B A G F E D C
Forever and always, my heart will sing

Outro:
G A B C D E D C B A G
I love you more, with every passing day
G A B C D E D C B A G
I'll always be here, no matter the way
G A B C D E D C B A G
Forever and always, my heart is yours
G A B C D E D C B A G
My love for you, forever endures.
